page.title: 13Brookmans Park Village Day
page.content: Village Day is the main event of the year in Brookmans Park.It is a large fete which involves the Primary school and many local organisations.It is held in June in the grounds of the Primary school.Thousands come to see the arena events,stalls and competitions. The day starts with a Pet Show. During the afternoon there are children's competitions and Fancy Dress.Stalls are run throughout the afternoon ranging from Ride a Pony to Win a Goldfish. The profits are mainly used to improve the Primary school and to help local charities.Last year (1984) was the 25th anniversary of Village Day.The day ends with a dance.
